core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Arabic calligraphy aesthetics.
Content is King: Data density is beautiful. Tables are the hero.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in bright office environments.
RTL First: Every design decision respects the Right-to-Left flow naturally, not as an afterthought.

usage_rules: Active navigation items MUST use Secondary Gold (#c2a356) for text or border.
Primary Actions (Add, Save) MUST be Primary Blue (#003366) or Gold (#c2a356) depending on hierarchy.
Status 'Paid' or 'Completed' MUST use Success Green (#008d5f).
NEVER use gradients for backgrounds. Solid, authoritative colors only.

Button.base: font-cairo font-bold transition-all duration-200 shadow-sm active:scale-95

Card.base: bg-white rounded-lg border border-slate-200 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

Table.wrapper: rounded-lg border border-slate-200 overflow-hidden bg-white shadow-sm

Input.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-300 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-400 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-[#c2a356] focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 text-right

Badge.base: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Prefer: Truck, Package, Users, FileText, Receipt, Trash2, LayoutDashboard, Search, Plus, Settings, LogOut.

universal_guidelines: RTL ENFORCEMENT: Ensure 'dir=rtl' is set on the root html/body tag.
NO GENERIC GRADIENTS: Use solid colors or very subtle noise textures.
HIGH DENSITY: This is a business tool. Avoid excessive whitespace in tables. Use 'p-2' or 'p-3' for table cells, not 'p-6'.
INTERACTIVE FEEDBACK: Every button and link MUST have a hover and active state.
ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure text contrast is high. Gold text on white might be hard to read; use Gold for borders/icons or dark backgrounds.
DATA-TESTID: All interactive elements must have a 'data-testid' attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Customer Management System for Al-Ghadeer Transport. Follow the color palette strictly. The layout must be RTL. Use the provided image URLs for the login page or dashboard widgets. Focus on functionality: Customer List, Add/Edit Customer, Delivery Receipts (Wusulat), Payment Receipts (Qabudat), Account Statement. Use Shadcn UI components but customize them to match the 'Logistic Commander' theme.
